name: Tangerine Dream Champagne Cocktail
description: Fresh tangerines and fresh ginger make for a super-flavorful winter cocktail.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sugar, water, ginger, and tangerine zest to a saucepan. Bring to a boil and stir until sugar is dissolved, then remove from heat and let cool. Stir in tangerine juice, cover, and chill in refrigerator until cold, about 1 hour.
Strain mixture (if desired) and divide between six Champagne flutes, and top off each glass with sparkling wine.
